revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CenturyLink |model=EQ-660HW |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/14/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=I88P660HWDXV2 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model=TNETD7200 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320DBTI-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9825G6EH-75 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1350A |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model=TNETW3422 |wi1_chip3_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip3_model=TNETW3427 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6996I |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Texas Instruments;TNETW3427;3427, UZ, 1011;1; |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ZyXEL_XXX |default_ssid_regex=^ZyXEL_[A-F0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=40:4A:03 |oui_eth=40:4A:03 }} {{TagLine|Wireless ADSL Gateway}}
"45-401-000681" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|MitraStar|Texas Instruments}}
This device is similar (but not 100% identical) to the [[ZyXEL P-660HW-D1 v2]]. :The firmware even identifies the device as a P-660HW-D1 v2.
[[Infineon]] branded CPU and [[Infineon]] branded wireless :(PSB7200ZDW, PSB1350AZGU, PSB3422).
The default SSID is '''ZyXEL_XXX''' where '''XXX''' is the last three hex digits :of the MAC printed on the label / the wireless interface MAC.
